Merge pull request #40 from dragoonis/patch-1

You're only able to extend/override $.facebox.settings by using the $.fn.
You're only able to extend/override $.facebox.settings by using the $.fn.facebox method, however you're unable to do so using the $.facebox(..) method. This fix lets you do just that.
Prevent ajax race condition. Fixes #36
Adding afterClose.facebox  to README!

Fix image type regexp to work with query strings and properly escape '.'

Authenticated S3 urls have a query string.

Tweak $.facebox.reveal

This stops facebox from blinding removing all `.loading` elements
the user might have in their facebox contents. It also displays only the
most recent view in case `reveal()` is called multiple times.
Fix loading size
Fix the loading not showing while loading contents.
